title: Beef Wellington
description: Treat yourself with this decedent dinner party recipe of tender beef fillet enclosed in mushrooms and buttery puff pastry.
ingredients: 1 kg/2lb 4 oz middle cut beef fillet, trimmed
¼ bunch of thyme, finely chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
a few drops of truffle oil
1 egg, lightly beaten, to seal the pastry
